snippet: President Park Geun-hye, who cannot be charged while in office, is accused of conspiring with a confidante to take $38 million in bribes from the technology company....

headline.main: Kremlin Says Seriously Worried About North Korea Missile Drills
headline.print_headline: Kremlin Says Seriously Worried About North Korea Missile Drills

lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye, who cannot be charged while in office, is accused of conspiring with a confidante to take $38 million in bribes from the technology company.
